description: Detects the execution GMER tool based on image and hash fields.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: HackTool - GMER Rootkit Detector and Remover Execution
query: ((process.executable.text:"*\\gmer.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*MD5\=E9DC058440D321AA17D0600B3CA0AB04* OR *SHA1\=539C228B6B332F5AA523E5CE358C16647D8BBE57* OR *SHA256\=E8A3E804A96C716A3E9B69195DB6FFB0D33E2433AF871E4D4E1EAB3097237173*)) OR (md5:"e9dc058440d321aa17d0600b3ca0ab04") OR (sha1:"539c228b6b332f5aa523e5ce358c16647d8bbe57") OR (sha256:"e8a3e804a96c716a3e9b69195db6ffb0d33e2433af871e4d4e1eab3097237173"))
